name: Message

components.materialDescription: a short piece of copper wire

description:
You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.
You can cast this spell through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier. Magical silence, 1 foot of stone, metal, or wood, or a thin sheet of lead blocks the spell.

effects.special: Sends a whispered message and allows a whispered reply.

engineHook.notes: Narrative-only spell. No direct combat mechanics to implement.
